com.iland.core.web.rest.api

Interface TaskResource

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable

    @Path(value="/task")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
 @Consumes(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
public interface TaskResource
extends Serializable
    Task Resource Interface.
    Author:
    Cory Snyder

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

    • Method Detail

      • getTask

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{locationId}/{taskUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
CoreTask getTask(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                            String locationId,
                                                                                                                            @PathParam(value="taskUuid")
                                                                                                                            String taskUuid)
        Get a task by its location ID and UUID.

        Whenever an asynchronous operation is initiated, the request will return a task. The uuid and location_id fields within the task can be used with this endpoint to query for updates on the task's status. Descriptions of the task fields are provided below:

        • synchronized: Indicates whether the task results have been synchronized and will be reflected in subsequent queries to the API for affected entities.
        • end_time: The time that the task completed. Will be null while the task is active.
        • active: Indicates whether the task has completed.
        • task_id: If the task represents an operation that occurs within another service (e.g. vCloud Director, vSphere, etc), then this field will contain the task ID native to that service.
        • org_uuid: The UUID of the org that this task belongs to.
        • message: If there is any meta-information to communicate about the task status, it will be provided here.
        • location_id: The ID of the provider vDC location.
        • initiation_time: The time that the task was initiated.
        • start_time: The time that the task actually started.
        • entity_uuid: The UUID of the entity that the task is associated with
        • start_time: The time that the task actually started.
        • entity_uuid: The UUID of the entity that the task is associated with
        • operation_description: If available, this field will provide a detailed description of the operation.
        • other_attributes: Some tasks may have extra information that could be useful. If so, it will be embedded here.
        • uuid: The UUID of this task.
        • task_type: The type of the task. E.g. vcd, veeam, vi, zerto.
        • operation: Indicates the operation that the task is performing.
        • status: The status of the task.
        • progress: The progess of the task as a percentage in the range 0 to 100, inclusive. Some tasks do not support a progress measure, for those the progress indicator will either be 0 or 100, to reflect whether the task is complete.

        Parameters:
        locationId - location id
        taskUuid - task uuid
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • getUnsynchronizedEntityTasks

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{locationId}/entity/{entityUuid}/active")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<CoreTask> getUnsynchronizedEntityTasks(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                                                       String locationId,
                                                                                                                                                                       @PathParam(value="entityUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                       String entityUuid)
        Get active tasks for a given location ID and entity UUID. Each task is associated with the entity that it is operating on. Use this endpoint to get all active tasks that are associated with a particular entity.
        Parameters:
        locationId - location id
        entityUuid - entity uuid
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • getUnsynchronizedEntityTasksByType

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{locationId}/entity/{entityUuid}/{taskType}/active")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<CoreTask> getUnsynchronizedEntityTasksByType(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                                                                        String locationId,
                                                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="entityUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                                        String entityUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="taskType")
                                                                                                                                                                                        String taskType)
        Get active tasks of a certain type for a given location ID and entity UUID. Each task is associated with the entity that it is operating on. Each task also has an associated type that is based upon the backing service that is carrying out the task (e.g. vcd, vi, veeam, zerto). Use this endpoint to get all active tasks of a particular type, that are associated with a particular entity.
        Parameters:
        locationId - location id
        entityUuid - entity uuid
        taskType - task type
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • getEntityTasks

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{locationId}/entity/{entityUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<CoreTask> getEntityTasks(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                                  String locationId,
                                                                                                                                                  @PathParam(value="entityUuid")
                                                                                                                                                  String entityUuid,
                                                                                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                                                                                  int offset,
                                                                                                                                                  @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                                  int limit)
        Get tasks associated with a given location ID and entity. Gets a paged lists of tasks that are associated with a particular entity. The results will contain both active and complete tasks.
        Parameters:
        locationId - location ID
        entityUuid - entity UUID
        offset - offset
        limit - limit
        Returns:
        asynchronous task details

      • getActiveTasksInOrg

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{locationId}/org/{orgUuid}/active")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<CoreTask> getActiveTasksInOrg(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                                        String locationId,
                                                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                        String orgUuid)
        Gets all active tasks associated with any entity in an organization. Gets all active tasks within a specified organization. That is, all tasks that are associated with an entity that is within the specified organization.
        Parameters:
        locationId - location ID
        orgUuid - organization UUID
        Returns:
        list of tasks

      • getTasksInOrg

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{locationId}/org/{orgUuid}")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<CoreTask> getTasksInOrg(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                           String locationId,
                                                                                                                                           @PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                           String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                                                                           int offset,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                           int limit,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                           String type,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="entity")
                                                                                                                                           String entity,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="user")
                                                                                                                                           String user,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="start")
                                                                                                                                           Long start,
                                                                                                                                           @QueryParam(value="end")
                                                                                                                                           Long end)
        Gets a paged list of tasks that are associated with any entity within the specified organization. Gets a paged list of tasks within a specified organization. The results will contain both active and complete tasks.
        Parameters:
        locationId - location ID
        orgUuid - organization UUID
        offset - offset
        limit - limit
        type - the task type.
        start - start date
        end - end date
        Returns:
        list of tasks

      • getSynchronizedTasksInOrg

        @GET
 @Path(value="/{locationId}/org/{orgUuid}/synchronized")
 @Produces(value="application/vnd.ilandcloud.api.v0.5+json")
List<CoreTask> getSynchronizedTasksInOrg(@PathParam(value="locationId")
                                                                                                                                                                    String locationId,
                                                                                                                                                                    @PathParam(value="orgUuid")
                                                                                                                                                                    String orgUuid,
                                                                                                                                                                    @QueryParam(value="offset")
                                                                                                                                                                    int offset,
                                                                                                                                                                    @QueryParam(value="limit")
                                                                                                                                                                    int limit)
        Gets a paged list of tasks within a specified organization. The results will contain just completed and synchronized tasks.
        Parameters:
        locationId - location ID
        orgUuid - organization UUID
        offset - offset
        limit - limit
        Returns:
        list of tasks
